hero.description: As a passionate junior front-end developer, I am dedicated to creating engaging and user-friendly web experiences. Explore my latest projects showcasing my skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development.
hire.title: Hire Me
about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, I'm Rahim Rady, a 20-year-old Computer Science student and bartender from Egypt, actively seeking opportunities in the IT industry to apply and expand my skills. My foundation in Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fuels my passion for creating innovative digital solutions. I approach every project with unwavering discipline and a strong work ethic, believing that hard work is the key to success in the tech world. My trilingual proficiency in Arabic, English, and French not only showcases my adaptability but also positions me uniquely in the global tech landscape. I am eager to contribute my technical skills, multicultural perspective, and dedication to a forward-thinking IT team, where I can grow professionally while making meaningful contributions to cutting-edge projects.
projects.title: My Projects
